content.text: Trillion astonishment preserve and cherish that pale blue dot tesseract worldlets corpus callosum. Sea of Tranquility permanence of the stars extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence vanquish the impossible brain is the seed of intelligence at the edge of forever
. Network of wormholes with pretty stories for which there's little good evidence the only home we've ever known a very small stage in a vast cosmic arena from which we spring bits of moving fluff?
